oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Old Dominion Barn Dance - Buck Owens and the Buckaroos - WRVA Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of an Old Dominion Barn Dance segment featuring Buck Owens and his Buckaroos (performers), on radio station WRVA (Radio Stations : Richmond, Va.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Buck Owens and his Buckaroos
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tone -- Buck Owens introduces the next tune -- Truck Driving Man (Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) -- Buck Owens talks and introduces the next tune -- A-11 (Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) -- Buck Owens and the band joke with the audience -- Please Release Me (Tom Brumley steel guitar, Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) -- Hello Trouble (Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) -- I Don't Have You (Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) -- Buck Owens talks and introduces the next tune -- Polka Medley (Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) -- Buck Owens talks and introduces the next tune -- Dang Me (Don Rich vocals, Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) -- Buck Owens talks and jokes with the audience -- Hello Walls #2 (Doyle Holly vocals, Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) -- Buck Owens talks and introduces the next tune -- Long Tall Texan (Tom Brumley vocals, Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) -- Buck Owens and the band joke with the audience -- It Tickles (Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) -- Window Up Above (Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) [George Jones impression] -- Jealous Hoss (Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) [Tex Ritter impression] -- Buck Owens and the band joke with the audience -- [Ernest Tubb impression]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WRVA (Radio station : Richmond, Va.); Owens, Buck, 1929-2006; Buck Owens; Buckaroos;
